title: The Bonfire Holiday Spectacular Part. 1.
description:
It's The Bonfire Christmas Spectacular live from the Village Underground in NYC! Jay gets loose with some shots as the festivities begin!

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
